question: NBA: Washington Wizards vs. Toronto Raptors 2023-03-02
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for March 2 at 7:00 PM:

If the Washington Wizards win, the market will resolve to “Wizards”.

If the Toronto Raptors win, the market will resolve to “Raptors”.

 If the game is not completed by April 16, 2023 (11:59:59 PM EST), the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NBA: 2023-03-02
events.description: This is a market group for NBA games happening on 2023-03-02
